Package router.rip

The router.rip package provides all the RIP related classes for the router.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
RIPPacket The RIPPacket class represents a RIP packet consisting of a command, version source and up to 25 RIP Entries.
RIPPacket.RIPEntry The RIPEntry class represents an entry in a RIP packet and consists of an address and a metric.
RIPService The RIPService class provides the RIP component of the router.
RoutingTable The RoutingTable class represents the RIP routing table.
 

Exception Summary
RIPPacket.InvalidRIPPacketException The InvalidRIPPacketException represents an error related to an invalid RIP packet.
 

Package router.rip Description

The router.rip package provides all the RIP related classes for the router.
